data.name: 8/8/88 Needle AL
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to the small rural town of Needle, Alabama. After his daily morning walk, Godfrey arrives back to town only to discover that something is terribly off. What happened in this town and where did everyone go? Unravel the bizarre, tragic and grim mystery as you traverse the eerie landscape.

8/8/88 Needle AL is told through beautiful and haunting 3D photographs that add a new level of realistic atmosphere . It's a unique mix of visual novel, walking sim, and hidden objects game. This game is in the same vain as our previous title "Wardwell House" which was enjoyed by many horror fans. This version of Needle AL is just the alpha version. We need feedback from you, the community, to help guide us about the direction of the game. More chapters are in the works that will be shaped according to this feedback and we plan to release these chapters in the full version.
data.about_the_game:
Welcome to the small rural town of Needle, Alabama. After his daily morning walk, Godfrey arrives back to town only to discover that something is terribly off. What happened in this town and where did everyone go? Unravel the bizarre, tragic and grim mystery as you traverse the eerie landscape.

8/8/88 Needle AL is told through beautiful and haunting 3D photographs that add a new level of realistic atmosphere . It's a unique mix of visual novel, walking sim, and hidden objects game. This game is in the same vain as our previous title "Wardwell House" which was enjoyed by many horror fans. This version of Needle AL is just the alpha version. More chapters are in the works that will be shaped according to this feedback and we plan to release these chapters in the full version.
data.short_description: 8/8/88 Needle AL is a realistic visual novel style game that is made from actual 360 degree photographs. You must read through clues to piece together the overall story. The game is dark and very atmospheric.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: NVIDIA GTX 970/AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Graphics Processor (0x15DD)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition Audio Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS X Yosemite
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Quad-Core Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 750M 2 GB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: AMD High Definition Audio Device
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
